content: वाङ्मय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Consisting of words; <ls>R. 3. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Relating to speech or words; <ls>Ms. 12. 6</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 15.</ls> {@--3@} Endowed with speech. {@--4@} Eloquent, rhetorical, oratorical. --यं {@--1@} Speech, language; म्यरस्तजभ्नगैर्लांतैरेभिर्दशभिरक्षरैः . समस्तं वाङ्मयं व्याप्तं त्रैलोक्यमिव विष्णुता Cand. <ls>M. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 90</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 72.</ls> {@--2@} Eloquence. {@--3@} Rhetoric. --यी The goddess Sarasvatī.
